com.netflix.genie.client

Class PigConfigServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.client.BaseGenieClient
      • com.netflix.genie.client.PigConfigServiceClient

  • public final class PigConfigServiceClient
extends BaseGenieClient
    Singleton class, which acts as the client library for the Pig Config Service.
